chapter.title: How to Contact Tech Support
chapter.para: Sometimes computers just refuse to work. Luckily, for that we have Tech Support Interns who can navigate the maze of lag and obscure errors. These are the ways to get help for your Freekbox.

section.title: By Phone
section.para: Tech Support can be reached at the above phone number. If you don't get an answer, don't worry, we will call back!

section.title: By E-mail
section.para: The above email address can be used to get help from Tech Support. If you can, please include details about what it is that happened and what you were doing when it happened.

section.title: In Person

para.emphasis: In past the front desks, and immediately to your left.

section.para:
Free Geek Tech Support is open from 12:00pm to 5:45pm, Tuesdays through Saturdays.
Feel free to stop by during those hours, if you bring your machine we can solve your issue much easier. We may ask you to leave the machine with us, so please keep in mind that we do not always know exactly how long it will take to diagnose and fix an issue.
